content: परिचक्ष् {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To declare, relate, tell. {@--2@} To enumerate. {@--3@} To mention. {@--4@} To name, call; वेदप्रदानादाचार्यं पितरं परिचक्षते <ls>Ms. 2. 171.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 13</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 17.">17.</ls> {@--5@} To disregard, overlook, pass over. {@--6@} To disapprove, reject. {@--7@} To acknowledge, admit. {@--8@} To address (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--9@} To answer.
